title: "[Integration Request] {Name}"

---

Please verify the integration is not already requested!

## **Describe the integration you'd like**
Name of the service or integration, and a description of what you'd like from it (donations, subs, sales, how to split it up, how would you like to configure it, etc).

## **Supporting Documentation**
If you are able to, it would be helpful to link documentation, API specs, or other information here.

## **Describe alternatives you've considered**
Is there already an ExternalService integration for this, either public or private? If so, how it works may help us develop a native integration/support!

## **Additional context**
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.
